name: Block Cubic Party Sports Physics - Soccer & Tennis
name_original: Block Cubic Party Sports Physics - Soccer & Tennis
description:
This is fully physics based 3D funny sports game. All you have to is click one button and try to first 5 goals!

Cubic Physics Sports is the free game for 3d Sports.
Battle with your friends, funny, amazing game play and physics.
You control to get ball and make player bouncy and shoot the ball in hoops.Cubic Physics sports is best game in stores
Features :

- 10 Sports to play : Super Soccer, Soccer, Outlast, Boulder Dodge, Basketball, Football, Hockey, Volleyball, Pit Ball, and Moon Ball. Face off against computer players and earn coins for each goal. Double coins when you win!
- Local multiplayer
- Fun Sports game with amazing physics.
- Two mode: One player, two players. Multiplayer will coming soon.
- Multiple character skin.
- Beautiful graphics, 3d Art game.

* How to play:
- Tap button to jump and release to shoot the basketball. Calculator to shooting ball in hoops.
- Get 5 goals to win.

DOWNLOAD NOW !!!!

Enjoy with Cubic Physics Sports - 2 Player Games. Beat your friends in amazing physics game.
